replies.author: JoieLu
replies.txt_content:
title
color e

@ECHO OFF

SET BINDIR=%~dp0
CD /D "%BINDIR%"
IF EXIST "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" (
ECHO Server start with:
ECHO Java7
"%ProgramFiles%\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xincgc -Xmx1024M -jar craftbukkit.jar
) ELSE (
IF EXIST "%ProgramFiles(x86)%\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" (
ECHO Server start with:
ECHO Java7 [ProgramFiles x86 path]
"%ProgramFiles(x86)%\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xincgc -Xmx1024M -jar craftbukkit.jar
)
)

PAUSE

replies.author: JoieLu
replies.txt_content:
title
color e

@ECHO OFF

SET BINDIR=%~dp0
CD /D "%BINDIR%"
IF EXIST "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" (
ECHO Server start with:
ECHO Java7
"%ProgramFiles%\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xincgc -Xmx1024M -jar 你的水桶jar名字
) ELSE (
IF EXIST "%ProgramFiles(x86)%\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" (
ECHO Server start with:
ECHO Java7 [ProgramFiles x86 path]
"%ProgramFiles(x86)%\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xincgc -Xmx1024M -jar 你的水桶jar名字
)
)

PAUSE
